attributes.action: Make use of a UK display operator for major and high profile UK fireworks displays such as London New Years Eve fireworks and the 2012 London Olympic opening ceremony fireworks..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fed up of the same old repetitive London New Years Eve firework display operated by a FOREIGN provider?

Hundreds of thousands of pounds are paid every year to French operator Groupe F to provide major UK fireworks displays, huge amounts of money valuable to our economy ploughed into another Countries!

Why is this the case when so many UK based companies have (and have demonstrated) the ability, technology and manpower to provide better shows reflecting more of the budget.

Where is our pride and patriotism?!

This years display cost the taxpayer over one million pounds, three hundred and thirteen thousand (313,000) pounds of that went into Groupe F's pocket!

If you would like to see what a 313K Firework display really looks like, please sign this petition.

Thank you

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
